short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rotten Potatoes replaces existing links on web pages with a Rickroll. You can customize the redirect URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looking for a way to Rickroll your friends on April 1st? Look no further than the Rotten Potatoes extension! This extension replaces all links on every website with a Rickroll or your custom URL on April Fools' Day with the press of a button. Open-source code available http://rottenpotatoes.me.
